programlisting:
<Extension syslog> Module xm_syslog </Extension>
<Extension json> Module xm_json </Extension>
<Input in> Module im_tcp Host 0.0.0.0 Port 1514 Exec parse_syslog_bsd(); # Dump $raw_event Exec log_info("raw event is: " + $raw_event); # Dump fields in JSON Exec log_info("Other fields are: " + to_json()); </Input>
<Output out> Module om_null </Output>
<Route r> Path in => out </Route>
